title: InferenceResponseToolCall
description:
An InferenceResponseToolCall is a request by a model to call a Tool
in the form that we return to the client / ClickHouse

id.description: A Tool Call ID to match up with tool call responses. See #4058.

raw_name.description: The name of the tool to call, as generated by the model.

raw_arguments.description: The raw arguments JSON string of the tool to call, as generated by the model.

name.description: The name of the tool to call, validated against tool configs. If not present, it means the tool call was invalid.

arguments.description: The arguments of the tool to call, validated against tool configs. If not present, it means the tool call arguments were invalid.
